org.greatage.javassist
Class ClassBuilder<T>

java.lang.Object
  org.greatage.javassist.ClassBuilder<T>
Type Parameters:
T - type of class that will be created by build() method
public class ClassBuilder<T>
extends Object

This class represents utility that helps to create classes in runtime uses javassist.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Ivan Khalopik

Constructor Detail

ClassBuilder

public ClassBuilder(ClassPoolEx pool,
                    String name)
Constructor that creates class builder and initializes it with specified class name. Class instance will be always created by build() method. Object will be a superclass of created class.

Parameters:
pool - ClassPoolEx instance
name - class name

ClassBuilder

public ClassBuilder(ClassPoolEx pool,
                    String name,
                    boolean isInterface)
Constructor that creates class builder and initializes it with specified class name and isInterface parameters. If isInterface parameter is true interface instance will be created by build() method. For class creation Object will be a superclass of created class.

Parameters:
pool - ClassPoolEx instance
name - class name
isInterface - isInterface parameter

ClassBuilder

public ClassBuilder(ClassPoolEx pool,
                    String name,
                    boolean isInterface,
                    Class<T> superClass)
Constructor that creates class builder and initializes it with specified class name, isInterface and superClass parameters. If isInterface parameter is true interface instance will be created by build() method. For class creation if superClass is null Object will be a superclass of created class, if superClass parameter is interface Object will be a superclass of created class and specified superClass parameter will be added to this class like a implemented interface.

Parameters:
pool - ClassPoolEx instance
name - class name
isInterface - isInterface parameter
superClass - superClass parameter, may be null
Method Detail

public Class<T> build()
Builds new class instance` represented by this class builder.

Returns:
new class instance

public ClassBuilder<T> addInterface(Class interfaceClass)

interfaceClass - interface class
Returns:
